item.title: Video Editor for E-Commerce Products - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Video Editor for E-Commerce Products

Job Summary

Create Facebook/IG video ads for our ecommerce products.

Responsibilities:

Create video of product assigned, using video clips from online clips and/or custom videos we provide.
Make sure the video follows the structure of the examples we have
Also make thumbnails for the videos

Requirements
Must be familiar with Facebook video ads
It’s an absolute must you be attentive to details and meticulous. The videos should be clean without errors or inconsistencies.  
English must be good enough to understand what copy to use and edit if need be.
Must know of AI tools for voiceovers (tell us what you use with samples you made)
Must be able to use camtasia so we can share source files and I can edit if need be

If this role is interesting to you, please reach out and express your interest. Please apply using the word “top” to show you've read the entire job post. You must also include sample videos you made from scratch.


We are only accepting candidates who send us up to 3 sentences and 3 video examples. If you send a long list of samples, sorry we cannot check them all.


Budget: $15
Posted On: June 18, 2024 09:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Camtasia, Video Editing, Ecommerce
Skills: Camtasia, Video Editing, Ecommerce
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor YouTube channel Global Finance Niche - Upwork
item.description:
Editor needed for YouTube channel about the Global Economy.
This is the channel: https://youtu.be/qaGWWFhBBSQ

- NO AGENCY'S, Only solo freelancers
- Video’s will be 20 minutes long
- A voice over and the script will be provided
- innitially 3 videos per week, later 5 videos per week.

We are looking for these requirements:
1. Fast turnaround time: 48 hours
2. Fast response time
3. Good understanding of storytelling and YouTube retention (AVD)

Let me know in your application:
- How many videos can be delivered per week?
- Send a relevant portfolio
- Mention the word Alpaca in the application.

Budget: $45

item.title: Search Creative Video Editor for YouTube - Imaging of Engaging Scripts. Youtube automation - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a creative and talented video editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will have the ability to transform written scripts into captivating and dynamic videos. You will be responsible for finding the right visual content and editing it to tell an engaging and captivating story on YouTube.

Our business is YouTube automation. I invite you to go and see what it's all about to understand what's expected of you.

Responsibilities :

Transform scripts into attractive, high-quality videos.
Find and integrate relevant visual content (video clips, images, animations) to illustrate scripts.
Ensure the coherence and fluidity of edited videos.
Work closely with editors and the production team to ensure that visual content perfectly complements the script.
Use video editing software to edit and enhance videos.
Add graphics, subtitles, transitions and special effects to enhance videos.
Adapt editing style to suit niche and target audience.
Stay abreast of the latest trends in video editing and YouTube content production.

Requirements:

Proven video editing experience, preferably with examples of previous work.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve or others.
Ability to research and select relevant, royalty-free visual content.
Animation and graphic design skills a plus.
Sense of visual storytelling and aesthetics.
Ability to work in a team and meet deadlines.
Portfolio or examples of edited videos required.


Posted On: June 18, 2024 08:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, YouTube
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, YouTube
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Seeking Skilled and Creative Video Editor for New YouTube Channel on Storytelling Comics - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a talented video editor with a passion for comics and storytelling? Join our new YouTube channel dedicated to captivating comic narratives!

Responsibilities:

- Edit and produce high-quality video content for our channel.
- Collaborate with the creative team to develop engaging videos.
- Use creative editing techniques to enhance storytelling.
- Deliver projects on time while maintaining high production standards.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a video editor with a portfolio (preferably in comics or storytelling genres).
- Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
- Strong creative skills and a passion for storytelling.
- Ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines.
- Interest in comics and graphic novels.
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience with YouTube or online content platforms.
- Familiarity with motion graphics and animation.
- Knowledge of sound design and audio editing.
- Understanding of current video editing and YouTube trends.

Why Join Us?

- Be part of an exciting new venture in comics and storytelling.
Work in a creative, dynamic environment.
- Opportunity for growth and showcasing your skills to a global audience.

We look forward to seeing your creativity in action!

Budget: $70
Posted On: June 18, 2024 08:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography
Country: Sweden
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Shorts - Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor to create engaging YouTube Shorts videos for our channel.

The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of the YouTube Shorts format and be able to create visually appealing and attention-grabbing videos.

Shorts video will range between 15 sec - 30secs.

60 shorts for a total of $10

Responsibilities:
- Source the internet for short sounds bits
- Source the internet for relevant video footage to use as overlay.
- Edit the video footage with audio using effects and transitions, and optimising videos for the YouTube Shorts platform.
- Add caption
- Add suitable music

Skills required:

- Strong understanding of the YouTube Shorts format
- Creativity and attention to detail

To apply for the position, please write code: YTS1 at the start of your proposal. And please send samples of your previous shorts work.


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 18, 2024 08:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Talented Editor to Help Publish 10-15 TikTok Reels/Week on Tech News - Upwork
item.description:
I would like an editor to work with me over the next 2 weeks to publish 10-15 Reels/Videos to be used on TikTok, YouTube, and X. Some of the clips will just be resizing to fit each social media channel.

The clips will mostly be interview and podcast clips related to Technology and AI.  I'll provide you with some quotes and we'll work together to refine them into finished videos. I would like you to help with both the storytelling and visual presentation components.

You must be available to exchange feedback and make adjustments between the hours of 9am - 11am PT Monday-Friday over the next two weeks.  

Starting on Thurs 6/20 till  Wed. July 3.

We'll mainly use Descript and Adobe Premiere.

$200/week, with the first milestone after 1 week and we'll reassess from there.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 18, 2024 08:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Descript, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Descript, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - UGC - Upwork
item.description:
We are a thriving e-commerce brand making waves in various international markets.

We are looking for an experienced and detail-oriented Video Editor  to collaborate closely with our creative team on UGC projects
Description

- You will create 3 videos using our content library.
- Video must contain voiceovers and subtitles, both in english.
- Also keep in mind the Facebook rules about nuditity / adult content.
- Each video should have minimum 3 versions

Requirements:

- Proven video editing experience, especially with UGC and voiceovers.
- Proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro.
- Ability to collaborate, take feedback positively, and meet tight deadlines.
- Knowledge of French or German will be a plus

How to Apply
Submit your resume and portfolio trough Upwork.
Looking forward to your application

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 18, 2024 08:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
